summary: This is a collection of NIF files containing a variety of mounted heads and floor stuffed bears for decorating your favorite hunting lodge.  This is not a mod, just a modder\'s resource.
descriptionHtml:
I have had these sitting around for a while collecting dust intending to make a hunting lodge type home.

It\'s just not going to happen any time soon and I\'ve had these NIFs for around a year so I might as well put them up for someone who might want them.  They appear properly in the Creation Kit and in-game since they use Vanilla textures.  

Contained are:
Floor stuffed bear: black, cave, polar
Wall-mounted:
Dragon
Falmer
Giant
Mammoth
The three varieties of Troll
Vampire Lord head (if you have Dawnguard)
Werewolf head
And finally a fancier wall-mounted champion-sized slaughterfish for you fishermen (and women) out there.
Also the wooden mount by itself for those who wish to make something unique of their own that fits the rest.

Some of these lack any collision data so it should be added in the Creation Kit, or however.  I\'m not going to guarantee much with these except that I got them to work, so with the right know how you should as well.  The NIFs work, I\'m just not providing Creation Kit instructions and the like.

I apologize in advance for the lame nifskope photos but that\'s all there is.  I\'m not in a position at the moment to take better ones.

I hope they\'ll finally get put to some use.
author: Budcat
